title: Rooster v4.5 WinAll Incl Keygen-TeamGBZ
description:
Rooster is a powerful and flexible RSS/ATOM/RDF feeds reader for Windows. It allows us to: Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ... enclosures/podcasts management. Ã‚Â· Support for all versions of RSS and ATOM feeds.
========
Features
========

Rooster is powerful news-feeds agent for Windows.
Some of the key features are:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for RDF, RSS & ATOM feeds.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simultaneously download articles for multiple feeds.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Post articles to ATOM-enabled blogs.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use templates to compose posts.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ News-Watch and variety of auto-checking options.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Store articles for off-line reading.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Manage (display/move/delete/flag) articles off-line.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Assign aliases to feeds.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Address feeds and keep URLs within an editable table for quick updating.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Manage (name/edit/create/delete/store) newsboxes for feeds.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Plain-text (UNIX-compatible) newsboxes to store articles.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Store feeds info in editable (plain text) files.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import and export subscriptions.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Harvest web sites for subscriptions.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for Usenet newsgroups.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Article grouping.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tokens: HTML forms for displaying articles.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Powerful Filters and Filter Report tool.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ News ticker.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Links History.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Enclosures Manager.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Organize subscriptions trough subscription-groups.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full Unicode support.

==========
What's New
==========

Offline Mode
+ Newsbox offline view.
$ Offline view applies for Preview Pane and articles (which will inherit newsbox offline view).
-+ Removed bunch of settings (View/Preview Pane/Display + Options/Newsboxes/Preview Pane) for a single switch (View/Offline).
+ Keyboard shortcut to switch newsbox offline/online view: Ctrl+O.
+ Newsbox Offline View interactive statusbar indicator.
$ Click/tap on a pane to switch online view on/off.
# Article online view redefined to "online view" from "display online elements from offline version".
+ Keyboard shortcut to switch article offline/online view: Ctrl+O.
+ Article Offline View interactive statusbar indicator.
# Global Offline Mode simplified and tied up with newsbox/article offline views.
+ Keyboard shortcut to turn Offline Mode on/off: Ctrl+Shift+O.

=================================
What's New/Version History Legend
=================================

+ --> New feature
- --> Removed/obsolete feature
* --> Bugfix
# --> Improvement/Tweak
$ --> Hint/Comment

===============
Version History
===============

Version 4.4
-----------

Enclosures
+ Enclosure: Open with [application].
+ Enclosure: Copy/Move to Folder.
+ Enclosure: Add to/Remove from Favorites.

Drag & Drop Support
+ Drag selected articles to Boxes pane to copy/move to selected newsbox.
+ Drag selected articles to a newsbox-tab to copy/move to corresponding newsbox.
+ Drag selected articles to another newsbox summary to copy/move to corresponding newsbox.
+ Drag an open article to Boxes pane, newsbox tab or newsbox summary to copy/move that article.
$ To transfer an open article to another newsbox, drag statusbar forklift icon to a newsbox in the Boxes pane (or to a tab, or to another newsbox summary).
$ Hold down the Shift key, while holding left mouse button down, to copy instead of move.
+ Drag xml-file(s), that contain feed-subscriptions, to the Feeds pane, to add subscriptions.
+ Drag (standardized) opml-file(s) to Feeds pane to import subscriptions.
+ Drag Internet feed URL(s) (from Firefox/Internet Explorer address bar) to Feeds pane to validate and subscribe to a feed, or preview available articles.
Installing Notes
1]Install using exe 
2]Aplly key from key.txt or use keygen to generate ur own
